Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: For 3 nites balls of lite 'danced' in the sky.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Punta Gorda
There were no other sightings in Punta Gorda on or around August 15th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailsseveral nieghbors and i observed these 'globes' over a 3 nite period.it was right after hurricane charley destroyed my town.we were living outside in tents because our house was destroyed.the first nite there was 20-30 of them. the 2nd 10-20 the 3rd only 5-10.they were 'globes' of lite that were glowing an irradecent colors. they would fly across the whole sky in the blink of an eye.they would go fast and slow and would 'merge' with each other.they did 'maneuvers' at such great speeds that a human-being could in no way survive. they were about 20 miles to the west of us that would put them out over the gulf of mexico.there was no sound at all.anything going that fast would make some kind of noise.i took videos of them the first 2 nites but we had no electric for 16 days and my battery died.watching them i got the feeling as if they were 'playing'.we were pretty far away but they didnt seem very big maybe only the size of a small car.this is the only time i have seen these 'speres' but i have seen 5 other 'shaped' 'craft'as well. it is my oinion that we are definitely not alone in this universe.
